          <div style="padding: 10px">
           <span id="ctl00_CPH_default_boxcontent_products">
            VSX - VOGEL SOFTWARE specializes in software and Internet solutions for the pump industry and develops applications for the selection and calculation of fluidic components and systems.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            The Spaix software solutions are comprehensive systems for the selection, configuration and quote generation of centrifugal pumps available for platforms Windows, Web and Mobile.
            <br/>
            <br/>
            <br/>
            <a class="mailto" href="products/default.aspx">
             Learn more
            </a>
            »

           <div class="infobox" id="infobox1">
            <span class="lb-infobox-header" id="ctl00_CPH_default_infobox2_head">
             <b>
              <font color="Black">
               Spaix 5 Now Available
              </font>
             </b>
            </span>
            <span id="ctl00_CPH_default_infobox2_txt">
             The brand-new software for selection and configuration of centrifugal pumps is now available. Besides functional enhancements the new version particularly shines when it comes to its completely redesigned user interface, the intuitive operating concept as well as the increased performance. Customers possessing a Service Level Agreement get the Spaix 5 upgrade free-of-charge. We'll gladly advise you!
             <a class="mailto" href="/contact/request.aspx">
              Get in touch
             </a>
             »
            </span>

          </div>
          <div class="innerib">
           <img alt="Info2" class="lazyload" data-src="/pics/home/infobox1_suc.png" height="95" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAAAAACH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAABAAEAAAICTAEAOw==" width="120"/>
           <div class="infobox" id="infobox2">
            <span class="lb-infobox-header" id="ctl00_CPH_default_infobox1_head">
             <b>
              <font color="Black">
               Spaix User Conference: Great success!
              </font>
             </b>
            </span>
            <span id="ctl00_CPH_default_infobox1_txt">
             <font color="Black">
              The third user conference concerning the Spaix software solutions was a great success for the participants as well as the organizers. Besides lectures by VSX employees as well as Spaix users, this year’s conference also offered practical workshops.
              <br/>
              Practiced Spaix users as well as prospective customers accepted the invitation and used the event to exchange experiences regarding the handling of the program.
              <a class="mailto" href="https://www.spaixuserconference.net/" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">
               Website
              </a>
              »
